title: Dealmaster: Last-minute savings to celebrate dads and grads
content:
Whether you're looking to celebrate the father figure in your life or have a new graduate ready for the next chapter, we have deals on last-minute technology, toys, and tools that will make great gifts.

From laptops and e-readers to smartwatches and headphones, our curated list of summer deals will help dads and grads stay active, nurture their minds, and enjoy some relaxation. But with Father's Day quickly approaching on Sunday, June 18, and graduation season already well underway, be sure to shop early to ensure your thoughtful gifts arrive in time for the festivity.
